title: Gardens and walking paths, Heating unit, Keyless entry, Linen closet
posting_body: 30-Day Satisfaction Guarantee!

Welcome to Hillsdale Garden
Call Now -
show contact info
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 652 Sq.
Ft.
Discover life on the Peninsula with the best of the Bay Area surrounding you at Hillsdale Garden apartments in San Mateo, CA.
Choose from our selection of studio, 1-, 2-, or 3-bedroom apartment homes and townhome-style residences to find the one that is right for you.
Our homes feature smart layouts with large closets and unique elements like stainless steel countertops and parquet wood floors (in select homes).
Our charming garden-style community welcomes you home with an abundance of amenities at your disposal.
Play a round or two of bocce ball on our court or take advantage of our playground.
Skip the gym membership and work out in our fully equipped fitness center.
Enjoy the beautiful California weather and take a dip in the pool or relax in the spa.
Our pet-friendly community even has a dog park, so you and your four-legged friend can get out and play.
Outside our community, you will immediately discover the benefits of our central location.
Hillsdale is a shopper’s paradise with major retailers mere minutes away at the Hillsdale Shopping Center.
Neighboring Laurelwood Park is the city’s largest park, offering picnic areas and trails leading to Sugarloaf Mountain.
When it comes to commuting, our location makes it easy.
Caltrain and SamTrans stops are close to our community as is access to highways 101 and 92, connecting you to the rest of the Bay Area.
Features:
Walk-in closets, Hardwood flooring, Keyless entry, Accent walls available, Smart home technology, Ultrafast Internet, Double-pane windows, Linen closet, Large closets, Heating unit
Community Amenities:

Fitness center, Courtesy patrol, Bocce ball court, On-site laundry, Club room, Online resident portal, Picnic area, Pet friendly, 24/7 emergency maintenance, Parking, Extra storage space available, Playground, BBQ area, Smoke-free community, Swimming pool, Gardens and walking paths, Dog park
Pet Policy
Pet friendly.
